text: Dave Adolph (June 6, 1937 - February 12, 2017) was an American football coach. He held coaching positions at National Football League teams including the Cleveland Browns, Oakland Raiders, Kansas City Chiefs and San Diego Chargers. He was born in Akron, Ohio. Adolph died on February 12, 2017, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American football coaches Category:American football linebackers Category:Sportspeople from Akron, Ohio
title: Dave Adolph
